1.input: Generate all the functional est cases for Giving Group Admins page. Use credentials menon.sanu@gmail.com / Test123# to login and prepare the functional test cases.
1.response:
Here's an example of how to generate functional est cases using Selenium and TestNG for the Giving Group Admins page of the charitableimpact.com app:

1. Log in to the app using the credentials provided in the instructions.

2. Navigate to the Giving Group Admins page using the URL provided.

3. In the test cases, generate the following functional test cases:
   - Create a new group: click on the "Create Group" button and fill in the group name, description, and email address. Press "Save" to create the new group.
   - Add members to a group: click on the "Add Members" button and enter the email addresses of the members you want to add. Click "Add Members" to add them to the group.
   - Remove a member from a group: click on the "Remove Members" button and enter the email addresses of the members you want to remove. Click "Remove Members" to remove them from the group.
   - Edit a group: click on the "Edit Group" button and enter the new group name, description, and email address. Click "Save" to update the group.
   - Delete a group: click on the "Delete Group" button and confirm the deletion.

4. Save the test cases in a text file, for example, "giving-group-admin-cases.txt".

5. Run the test cases using the Selenium IDE tool or a different testing tool.

6. Verify that the test cases pass and generate the expected output.

By following these steps, you can generate functional est cases for the Giving Group Admins page of the charitableimpact.com app using Selenium and TestNG.
